payload.title: Audit Feedback Adapter to Perfect Score
payload.description: Audit feedback_adapter.md using adapter-designer criteria. Elevate from 8.0/10 to 10.0/10 perfection by adding: detailed specification of 5 methods, complete data types (FeedbackPayload with rich metadata), 12 specific EARS, section 9 Cross References, graceful degradation example, <50ms performance targets.
payload.notes: Perfection achievement establishing feedback_adapter as standard for CRUD + events adapters with structured communication.
